title: Update stale docs in docs wiki
body:
There is currently a lot of stale documentation around the wiki. Those need to be updated as they are not correct anymore.

These are the changes that need to be made
- [x] [Interactions with internal repo](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/documentation/wiki/Interactions-with-the-internal-repository.md)
  - [ ] Files are automatically synced: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/5531
  - [ ] Files mentioned moved within the repo, [to a new repo](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/src/MSBuild/MSBuild/Microsoft.Build.Core.xsd)
